3.name: Villager
3.text: "Over here! The dragon is in the square! Hurry!"

4.name: Eni-sensei
4.text: "In the square...? The dragon is coming?"

5.name: Villager
5.text:
"Yes... it seems like it's injured... It's not
rampaging, and it doesn't seem to be moving at
all..."

6.name: Villager
6.text:
"We don't know what to do... That's why we have to
ask Eni-sensei, the best adventurer in the
neighborhood..."

7.name: Eni-sensei
7.text:
"I'm not the best in the neighborhood. Anyway, I
understand the situation. Let's do something about
it. Everyone, please stay away."

10.name: Narration
10.text:
In the village square, a gigantic dragon covered
in golden scales lay sprawled. Its body,
reflecting the light of torches, was heavily
stained with blood, and it trembled weakly in the
face of death's jaws.

12.name: Eni-sensei
12.text:
"Gold Dragon...! Judging from its body... it's
probably in its youth (adult) stage. ...It's a
fatal wound, isn't it... It won't be long now..."

13.name: Villager
13.text: "I-Is... is it going to be okay...?"

14.name: Eni-sensei
14.text:
"Gold dragons are mostly of good alignment and
follow the laws of order. They do not eat people.
Probably."

15.name: Villager
15.text: "P-Perhaps... Is it safe to approach, sensei!?"

17.name: Eni-sensei
17.text:
"What happened? Is there anything I can help
with?"

19.name: Narration
19.text:
The golden dragon, whose consciousness had become
slightly clearer upon hearing fluent dragon
language, looked weakly at the female adventurer
referred to as "sensei."

21.name: Kinryu
21.text:
"Our friend, the little one, the human child...
Could you please take on our final request in this
life?"

23.name: Kinryu
23.text:
"I fought against the red dragon that sought to
take our nest, but I was defeated... However, I
want to save this child, this child alone...
Somehow, I managed to escape to the human
village..."

25.name: Eni-sensei
25.text:
"An egg...! A dragon's egg, is it...? In order to
protect this child..."

26.name: Kinryu
26.text:
"Please... please, can you take care of this
child... This child alone... is my only regret...
I entrust it to you..."

28.name: Eni-sensei
28.text:
"Understood. I will take responsibility for your
child. I swear by my name, Enitouraya, and my
sword."

30.name: Eni-sensei
30.text: "So please, rest assured and get some sleep."

32.name: Kinryu
32.text:
"I am grateful... Please... take care of that
child..."

37.name: Narration
37.text:
A female adventurer offers a silent prayer for the
dragon's remains. Seeing this, the surrounding
villagers also hurriedly follow suit.

39.name: Villager
39.text: "Um, so... what on earth is happening here...?"

40.name: Eni-sensei
40.text:
"It seems that Kinryu was attacked by an evil red
dragon in its nest, and despite being on the brink
of death, it managed to escape and arrive at this
village. It wanted to entrust its child... even
just the egg... to someone."

41.name: Villager
41.text:
"I see... So, sensei, you're also proficient in
the language of dragons... Wait, sensei!? Did you
by any chance agree to take care of it!?"

42.name: Eni-sensei
42.text:
"I'm not the type of woman who can ignore the
final wish in this situation."

43.name: Eni-sensei
43.text:
"A proud golden dragon, on the brink of death,
asked for help from a human... and even entrusted
its own child. It's not something I can just
refuse, after all."

44.name: Villager
44.text:
"Well, it's certainly befitting of a teacher...
But, um, sensei... do you have any experience with
raising dragons?"

45.name: Eni-sensei
45.text:
"There's no way I have any experience. I haven't
even given birth to my own child, let alone being
unmarried."

46.name: Eni-sensei
46.text:
"But I made a promise, you know. Even though I'm
called a sage in some way. I'll do my best to live
up to that name and figure something out."

47.name: Eni-sensei
47.text:
"There is something I would like everyone to help
with. Please, I'm counting on you all."

49.name: Villager
49.text:
"Well... if it's the teacher asking, I can't
refuse." "We don't even know how many times she's
saved the village." "If we can repay even a little
bit of the favor, I'd be happy to help."

50.name: Eni-sensei
50.text:
"Thank you very much. ...And right now, it's just
my intuition, but... there's a possibility that
this egg might become the key to saving the
village──────"
